Welcome to CAOS_Software_Package_7.0 - Help

This document contains the headers of the main routine xxx.pro of each module XXX. You can find more information about each routine of the CAOS_Software_Package_7.0, as well as of the whole CAOS PSE, either by editing the header of the routine itself or, alternatively, by typing at the IDL prompt:

doc_library, "routine_name"

where routine_name is the string corresponding to the name of the routine (e.g. "n_phot", "addnoise", "AIC", "ATA", etc.). The routines available in this version of the Software Package are listed in the following table and described in the next page.

List of Routines

AIC ATA ATM
AVE BQC BSP
CFB COM COR
DMC DMI GPR
IBC IMA IMG
IWS LAS MDS
NLS PYR REC
SCD SLO SRC
SSC STF SWS
TCE TFL TTM
WFA
